title: NBC vs AOC, IG Activism 8.20.20
itunes:title: NBC vs AOC, IG Activism 8.20.20
description:
In episode 698, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Charla Lauriston to discuss AOC's appearance at the DNC, Americans not being satisfied with the treatment of Black people, Instagram activism, more evidence of cops lying, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Absurd Reality of Being Black in America
  2. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez accuses NBC of spreading misinformation after DNC speech
  3. AOC symbolically nominates Bernie Sanders in 60-second DNC speech
  4. Satisfaction with treatment of Black Americans lowest since first measured in 2001: Gallup
  5. The Lazy Liberalism of Instagram Slideshows
  6. Video of Raptors President Masai Ujiri, security guard encounter released as Ujiri files countersuit
  7. WATCH: The Comet is Coming - Birth of Creation

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
